Job Title: Program Manager - Software Development Projects  - Ecommerce/retail
Job Description: PROGRAM MANAGER (BUSINESS SEGMENT: PRODUCT MANAGEMENT)As a Program Manager, you will manage multiple projects end-to-end, ensuring that we build high quality features and deliver on time to delight our customers. This role is inherently cross-functional - you will work closely with product teams, engineering teams, operations & business users, external vendors and partners. As a Program Manager, you will anticipate bottlenecks, make trade-offs, and balance customer and business needs versus technical constraints. An ability to take large, complex projects and break them down into manageable pieces, and then deliver them in a successful and timely manner is expected. Understanding of business goals, ability to identify and track dependencies, maturity, high judgement, negotiation skills, ability to influence, analytical talent, and leadership are essential to success in this role.
